block.p: Suzanne Kerri Dick, the daughter of Barbara and Stephen Dick of Marlboro, N.J., is to be married today to Seth Craig Leifer, the son of Madge Weitz and the stepson of Emanuel Weitz of Hallandale, Fla. Rabbi Bernhard Rosenberg will perform the ceremony at Congregation B'nai Tikvah in North Brunswick, N.J.
The bride, 28, is an account manager at Interep National Radio Sales, radio advertising representatives in New York. She graduated from Ohio State University.

Suzanne Kerri Dick, the daughter of Barbara and Stephen Dick of Marlboro, N.J., is to be married today to Seth Craig Leifer, the son of Madge Weitz and the stepson of Emanuel Weitz of Hallandale, Fla. Rabbi Bernhard Rosenberg will perform the ceremony at Congregation B'nai Tikvah in North Brunswick, N.J.
The bride, 28, is an account manager at Interep National Radio Sales, radio advertising representatives in New York. She graduated from Ohio State University.
The bridegroom, 35, is the assistant general manager at AM Entertainment, an advertising agency in New York. He graduated from the State University College at Oneonta, N.Y.
